angel1.content: Get up! Take the child and his mother and escape to Egypt.

a.content: Stay there until I tell you, for Herod is going to search for the child to kill him.

b.content: Be assured, Joseph, for God will protect you and your child as necessary to glorify him at the proper time.

caught.content: Aha! Caught you, you sneaky peasant! To King Herod you will pay your dividends.

angel2.content: Get up, take the child and his mother and go to the land of Israel, for those who were trying to take the child’s life are dead.

end.content: But when he heard that Archelaus was reigning in Judea in place of his father Herod, he was afraid to go there. Having been warned in a dream, he withdrew to the district of Galilee, 23 and he went and lived in a town called Nazareth.

a.content: So was fulfilled what was said through the prophets, that he would be called a Nazarene.
